name: Dress Up Princess
description:
Dress Up Princess - Your little kids will love the ballerina and her outfits. Dress Up Princess Features: - Enclothe the little princess in a fashion style - Choose the cutest hair style out there to fit the princess fashion dresses - Dress and undress the princess with ease - Customize your princess gown, shoes, dresses and skirts How to play: - Simply touch the outfits or the clothes on the left side of the screen and the princess will be garbed. - You can also undress the little princess with a simple touch over the dresses or accessories or any other elements that she's garbed with. Please give us 5 stars if you like the game to create more princess dress up games for free!

Dress Up Princess - Create your own outfits fit for the most beautiful princess in the whole wide world. Skirts, bathing suits, necklaces, earrings, different hair styles, dresses are all available in the dress up game for free! Choose the perfect combinations of outfit for your little princess so she will be ready for the ball to meet the perfect prince. When the girl is clad , don't forget to add some of the nicest necklaces and purses out there, to top it up, choose the perfect shoes for the ball room or for the beach! You can enclothe the princess in her room, in her dresses room and for the seaside. You will love the graphics of the game and the music.

Dress Up Princess game transform into a little girl, hero or a princess. Princess Dress Up game will bring you into a world of fashion, of fairytales and cuteness. Design gorgeous outfits and dresses for your little princess and add the most beautiful accessories, purses, necklaces and more. This is a wonderful makeup and dress up game for your little kids to enjoy, they will love every second of it. Our little girl princess has 80+ cute outfits and dresses that you can choose from.
